trackOrder.question: How do I track my order?
trackOrder.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the Orders section. Alternatively, use the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.

returnPolicy.question: What is your return policy?
returnPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be unused and in their original packaging.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform
terms.introduction: Welcome to EasyCasse. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By registering an account or using any services provided by EasyCasse, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, as well as our Privacy Policy and any other policies referenced herein.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You must create an account to use certain features of our platform. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password, and for all activity that occurs under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

listings.title: Product Listings
listings.content: Sellers must ensure that all product listings are accurate, complete, and not misleading. Products must comply with all applicable laws and regulations. EasyCasse reserves the right to remove any listing that violates these terms or that we deem inappropriate at our sole discretion.

payment.title: Payment and Fees
payment.content: Buyers agree to pay the full purchase price of items as listed, plus any applicable shipping fees. Sellers will receive payment after successful delivery of the product, minus any applicable platform fees. Our fee structure is available in the Seller Guidelines section.

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.content: Sellers are responsible for shipping products within the timeframe specified in their listings. Buyers will receive tracking information once the item is shipped. Risk of loss and title for items purchased pass to the buyer upon delivery of the items to the shipping carrier.

returns.title: Returns and Refunds
returns.content: Our return policy allows buyers to return items within 30 days of delivery if the product does not match the description or is defective. Specific return procedures are outlined in our Return Policy section.

importantNotices.title: Important Notices
items: EasyCasse reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice.
We may temporarily or permanently suspend access to our services for violations of these terms.
Disputes between users should first be addressed through our resolution center before pursuing legal action.
These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 123 Avenue des Champs-Élysées, 75008 Paris, France

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information
privacy.introduction: At EasyCasse, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and services. By using EasyCasse, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
content: Personal information such as name, email address, and phone number when you register an account
Transaction data including purchase history, payment details, and shipping information
Usage data such as how you interact with our platform, including browsing history and search queries
Device information including IP address, browser type, and operating system
Location data to provide location-based services and regional pricing
Communication records when you contact our customer service team

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
content: To provide and improve our services, including processing transactions and customer support
To personalize your experience with relevant product recommendations and search results
To communicate with you about your account, orders, and promotional offers
To detect and prevent fraud, security breaches, and potentially prohibited activities
To analyze usage patterns and optimize our website performance
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information
All payment information is encrypted using industry-standard SSL technology
We regularly review our data collection, storage, and processing practices to prevent unauthorized access
We limit access to personal information to employees who need it to perform their job functions
While we take precautions to safeguard your information, no system is completely secure

yourPrivacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
content: Access and update your personal information through your account settings
Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
Ask us to delete your personal information in certain circumstances
Opt out of marketing communications at any time
Set your browser to refuse cookies, although this may affect your user experience
Lodge a complaint with a data protection authority if you believe your rights have been violated

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized services
Essential cookies enable basic functionalities and security features of our website
Analytical cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our platform
Marketing cookies track your online activity to deliver targeted advertising
You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings

contactUs.title: Contact Us About Privacy
content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@easycasse.com
Postal address: 123 Avenue des Champs-Élysées, 75008 Paris, France

updates.title: Updates to Privacy Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements
The updated policy will be posted on our website with a revised 'last updated' date
We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies
cookies.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how EasyCasse uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information. They help us to provide you with a better experience by enabling us to understand which pages and features are most popular.

types.name: Essential Cookies
types.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

types.name: Performance/Analytics Cookies
types.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. They help us count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site.

types.name: Functionality Cookies
types.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

types.name: Targeting/Advertising Cookies
types.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as help measure the effectiveness of the advertising campaigns.

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.intro: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can set or amend your web browser controls to accept or refuse cookies. If you choose to reject cookies, you may still use our website though your access to some functionality and areas of our website may be restricted.
options: Most web browsers allow some control of most cookies through the browser settings. To find out more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set, visit www.aboutcookies.org or www.allaboutcookies.org.
Find out how to manage cookies on popular browsers: Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Internet Explorer, Opera, Apple Safari.
To opt out of being tracked by Google Analytics across all websites, visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content: If you disable or refuse cookies, please note that some parts of this website may become inaccessible or not function properly. For more information about the cookies we use, please contact us at privacy@easycasse.com.

updatesPolicy.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
updatesPolicy.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. Please therefore re-visit this Cookie Policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies and related technologies.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or other technologies, please email us at:

pickup.title: Request UPS Pickup
pickup.scheduleDescription: Select a date and time for UPS to pick up your package. Make sure the package is ready with the shipping label attached.

warnings.addressIncomplete: Seller address information is incomplete. Please update the seller profile with complete address details.
warnings.phoneRequired: Seller phone number is missing. UPS requires a valid phone number for pickup requests. A default phone number will be used, but it's recommended to update your seller profile with a valid phone number.

status.title: Pickup Status
status.note: Note: Pickup status information is updated periodically by UPS. Refresh this page to get the latest status.
status.processing: UPS is processing your pickup request. Status information will be available soon.

success.title: Pickup Request Successful
success.note: Important: A UPS driver will arrive during the scheduled pickup window. Please ensure that your package is ready with the shipping label attached.

info.title: Pickup Information
guidelinesList: Ensure your package is properly packaged and labeled.
The package must be ready by the beginning of your selected time window.
The UPS driver will provide a receipt for the picked-up package.
If you need to cancel, please do so at least 2 hours before the scheduled pickup time.
There may be an additional fee for pickup services based on your location and package details.
info.note: Note: Standard pickup cutoff times may vary by location. For same-day pickup requests, please schedule before 4:00 PM local time.

authentication.loginRequired: Please log in to request a pickup
